projects.title: React Livestream Platform
projects.description: A responsive live stream event platform. Complete with an Event page and an Archive page. Integrated with Vimeo using REST API. Built with React and SCSS . Converted from a Figma design.

projects.title: Author Landing Page
projects.description: A responsive marketing page for the Author of Geriatric Notes. Built with BootStrap 5 and CSS. To host I used Netlify and connected the Contact form to Netlify's built-in form collection system.

projects.title: Sample Portfolio Page
projects.description: A sample portfolio page I made using html, css and bootstrap converted it from a Figma Design. It's is fully responsive for mobile and desktop.

projects.title: Ehya Landing Example
projects.description: A polished responsive marketing page. Worked in tandem with a designer to convert Figma design using Bootstrap 5 and custom CSS styling.

projects.title: WP Livestream Platform
projects.description: A responsive livestream event platform. Built with Wordpress/Divi. Complete with an Archive page and an Event page. I created this site in a way that it could be duplicated, to adapt the site to future events.

projects.title: Help Beacon
projects.description: An app that allows those in crisis to reach out to their support group.We built landing page with Bootstrap 5 and app with React. I introduced a git/github workflow to the developers. We placed 2nd!

projects.title: Ventia
projects.description: Combined efforts with a team of  developers and designers. Ventia, a safe place to vent. We used React.js, Next.js, CSS-in-JS as well as custom hooks for better control over the responsiveness of the app.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: My portfolio! Built with BootStrap 5, CSS and JavaScript. Hosted with Netlify. Always working to improve it, will happily take any constructive criticism

projects.title: Light Tower
projects.description: My first Hackathon. A wonderful  experience of staying up for 48 hours! Worked alongside two UX  designers. Converted their  Figma Design into a  landing  page using Vue.js and CSS. We placed 2nd!
